object.name: image_artifact
object.property: <model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="image" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobImage"> <description/> <title>Image</title> </field> <field name="coverage" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Coverage</title> </field> <field name="format" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Format</title> </field> <field name="identifier" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Identifier</title> </field> <field name="language" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Language</title> </field> <field name="publisher" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Publisher</title> </field> <field name="relation" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Relation</title> </field> <field name="rights" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Rights</title> </field> <field name="source" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Source</title> </field> <field name="subject" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Subject</title> </field> <field name="dublin_core_type" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Type</title> </field> </schema> </model>
